name: Meta Carbon
introduce: Meta Carbon is a technology company that helps brands engage their audience on the topic of climate change. Meta Carbon’s platforms sell carbon at retail, integrate with business operations, tokenize carbon and make carbon offsetting as transparent as possible. Meta Carbon seeks to help companies reduce both their own and their customers’ carbon footprint. By fractionalizing carbon in NFTs, it makes it possible to integrate climate solutions into Web3 based games, loyalty programs, and at point of sale.
